page.title: 09A day in the life of ....
page.content: It was a Saturday morning when my brother's clock-radio woke me up. I said to him "What are you doing this morning",and he said "Nothing much". I got out of bed, got dressed and went into the bathroom and washed my face. At about 9.30 I went downstairs for my WEETABIX and turned on the radio . At 10.00 I watched television. At 10.30 David called for me, and we went to Mrs. Mead's to buy some sweets and David scrounged off me. Up the playing field we played cricket until about 12.30 then I went home and had sausage & chips which my mum got from the chippie and at 2.00 I went to the field again & watched Cary play cricket. At 4.00 I played cricket again at 5.00 I had my tea and at 5.30 when my mum got home from work I watched tele. At 9.45 I went to bed & watched tele on the portable set.
